name: Crystal Phone
info: Can make calls and texts. Some applications are also functional.

name: Crystal Pistol
info: A magic powered gun that can deal some damage. Deals 1d6 damage up to thrown range with ammo. Requires proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.

name: Crystal Top
info: Makes research and some applications more achievable. You can roll WITH LEVERAGE when doing research.

name: Knife
info: Deals 1d4 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Extendable Baton
info: A handy dandy extendable baton. Not the most threatening weapon but you can certainly give someone a thrashing. This deals 2 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Tazer
info: Can be used to try to stun someone. Make a melee attack against an afflictable target. On a SUCCESS, the target is stunned. The next roll against them HAS LEVERAGE. You deal 1 damage before ARMOR on a SNAG.

name: Nunchucks
info: A great weapon for a skilled martial artist. Tricky to use though. Deals MARTIAL + DEXTROUS damage on SUCCESS. Deals 1d4 damage on SNAG.

name: Sword
info: Deals 4 damage plus STRONG or MARTIAL. (Deals only 1d4 on SNAG)

name: Staff
info: A quality staff can be used well by a skilled martial artist. Deals 1d6 damage.

name: Light Covert Vest
info: Reduces incoming damage by 1 when worn.

name: Heavy Bullet Proof Vest
info: Reduces incoming damage by 2 when worn. (Can't reduce damage to 0)

name: Weed x 5
info: Whatever form you enjoy THC, for the next 1d4 rolls you make, you LOSE LEVERAGE. If you're sharing with someone, you GAIN LEVERAGE when you use social rollls with them.

name: AMF (Arcane & Magic Field) Jacket
info: You can block a lot of magical energies and frequencies. Reduces damage from spells and magic by 1.

name: Brass Knuckles
info: Adds +1 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.
